function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 epidemic on mental health","Impact":"Increased risk of psychological symptoms and disorders","Mitigation":"Implementing mental health support programs and interventions","Technologies":"Telemedicine, virtual therapy platforms","People":"General population","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Psychological impact of quarantine related to COVID-19 infection","Impact":"Feelings of frustration, uncertainty, emotional unpreparedness, and helplessness","Mitigation":"Providing psychosocial support, communication, and coping strategies","Technologies":"Tele-counseling, online support groups","People":"Individuals under quarantine and social restrictions","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of direct strategy to manage psychosocial issues related to COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Increased risk of unaddressed mental health concerns in the community","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing community-based mental health programs and support services","Technologies":"Community outreach platforms, online mental health resources","People":"General community","Owner":"Community organizations, mental health professionals"}]}
